text: This is the testing time for all. The affair blows up into a national disaster and then when it is all over life must continue as before. During this period the Captain must present an unruffled appearance and carry on as if nothing unusual has happened. Harry Turton had written letters to the bereaved, had visited many in the locality, had been interviewed by the Press, had driven his surviving submarines a good deal occasions.
handwritten_text: This is the testing time for all. The affair blows up into a national disaster and then when it is all over life must continue as before. Harry Turton had written letters to the bereaved, had visited many in the locality, had been interviewed by the Press, had driven his surviving submarines a good deal occasions.
